#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

long long mod=1e9+7;

int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    for(int p=0;p<t;p++){
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        unsigned long long int a[n],ans=1;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            cin >> a[i];
            a[i]=a[i]%mod;
            ans=(ans*a[i])%mod;
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
